title: The Fatties: Fart 2
description: America’s favorite big family is back, letting loose with even more wild antics. And of course, plenty of beans.
quote: In some countries, it’s considered a compliment.
altHero: Jeff Portnoy holding a fork, wearing a bright yellow suit with a dorky blonde bowl cut
alt2: Portnoy as a teen girl with pink and black pigtails and hot pink goth aesthetic
alt3: Portnoy as a redhead boy wearing a shirt that says “I @#%! on the first date”
alt4: Portnoy as a whole family dancing around the dinner table
